biotools.summary: Total Integrated Archive of Short-Read and Array (TIARA) database, contains personal genomic information obtained from next generation sequencing (NGS) techniques and ultra-high-resolution comparative genomic hybridization (CGH) arrays. This database improves the accuracy of detecting personal genomic variations, such as SNPs, short indels and structural variants (SVs).

galaxy.summary: Tool for identification of eukaryotic sequences in the metagenomic datasets.
